level.heading: DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES OF TEACHERS (ยง 29-335)

level.text: The duties of each teacher in a Child Development Center shall include the following:
Assisting the Center Director in ensuring compliance with this Chapter,
Providing, and/or overseeing the provision of, adequate supervision and appropriate care for all of the children in his or her class or group at all times;
Planning and initiating daily activities based on the assessed strengths, interests and needs of all of the children in his or her class or group;
Assisting the Center Director in implementing the Facility’s policies and procedures;
Attending in-service training programs and completing continuing education requirements, as required;
Communicating regularly with the parent(s) or guardian(s) of each child in his or her class or group about the development of their children;
Assuming responsibility for the program of the Facility in the absence of the Center Director, if and when so designated; and
Performing other appropriate duties as requested by the Center Director.
